Articles.Content:
If you're struggling to secure your payload that is enveloped in fairings, check this out!

there is 1 known side-effect: the struts persist even after the fairings are jettisoned, which may or may not look awesome.

Neat.

Pity I learn of this only now. Wouldn't carry four full-sized I-beams to Eve to keep the miniprobes from wobbling. But then hey, it's good for the future. Damn, my next miniprobe carrier is gonna be lean! Pure 1.25m fairing holding a neat stack of miniprobes. (the struts connect to stack separators, the only side effect is the number of space junk per probe)
